name: Idle Taxi Tycoon: Empire
description:
Welcome to Idle Taxi Tycoon! Are you ready to be part of the best Taxi Crew in Town? We hope you are, the Taxi Station is waiting for you!



This Taxi Simulator game will give you the chance to become an Idle Taxi Tycoon. This is not just a driving game where you become a taxi driver, in this idle game you can get rich, get more Taxi Stations, hire and manage taxi drivers!



This idle game simulator is not just about tapping, you have to develop a good strategy to get rich, buy more taxis, and manage jobs from passengers. Transport people all over the city: Hotel, Hospital, High School, University, Prison, or Airport - Taxis are needed everywhere!



If you love tycoon games and you dream about managing a crew of ragtag drivers, then it’s time to start playing Idle Taxi Tycoon! Once you get rich, you will be able to expand your empire across the city and transport people from everywhere! In other Taxi Games, you can’t even upgrade the cabs or expand your HQ, but in this clicker game, it is possible to become an Idle Tycoon and help people.


Unlike other tap games and simulators, use your riches to tap and improve your Taxis, even earning money when you are offline. Come back and jump right into this Taxi Car Game!
Do you have what it takes to become a rich idle taxi tycoon? Start tapping and make more money, play also offline! To become a millionaire tap tycoon and get rich just upgrade the kitchen, emergency call room, and leisure room, get the maximum out of this idle game!



Features:


- Use your profit to manage your taxi station. Hire the best drivers and assign them to routes!
- Each driver has its unique driving style and skills!
- Manage and optimize your Taxi Station! No other Idle Tycoon Game will give you so many options!
- Have you become a millionaire already? Then start tapping, because in this taxi car game you can upgrade your taxi stations to make them bigger! Level up and tap, expand the garage and call room of your taxi station so that your drivers can provide transport for more and more people!
- Enjoy new Taxi challenges in this exciting tycoon game! Just one call can start the adventure and you can be the hero in this idle game!



Unlike other clicker games, you can dispatch Taxis, while you manage your drivers and tap to become a millionaire idle tycoon full of gold and riches. Will you become the Taxi Tycoon in this Idle Game?
